description: This small but beautifully kept restaurant set back from the lakeside serves contemporary-style cuisine that includes a good balance of meat and fish recipes, all made from top-quality, seasonal ingredients. Dishes are creative and full of individual character, with the occasional nod to Asia. Attractive enclosed veranda.
creditCards: ['American Express credit card', ' Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
